data.title: About â€” LP Equestrian Center
data.text:
Welcome to LP Equestrian center a premier boarding facility located in Casco, Michigan. We started LP Equestrian in hopes to create a welcoming place that provides top quality individualized care for every horse and riders needs. Our daughter Lillyana's passion for horses led us down many roads on our way to creating LP Equestrian Center. This passion became a labor of love for Lillyana's father, who decided to create Lillyana her own Barn. What resulted was LP Equestrian Center.

We do this because we genuinely want to be here and love sharing our passion for riding and caring for horses with the equestrian community. We know what we value in an equestrian facility; modern amenities, caring and available staff, clean and well tended boarding and grooming areas, and that is exactly what you will experience at LP Equestrian Center. Whether you are a new rider, eager and nervous to climb into the saddle for the first time, or an experienced rider interested in Dressage, Hunter/Jumper or Eventing, we'd love for you to make LP Equestrian Center your new home.

How many stalls does LP Equestrian have?

We have just expanded by adding 8 more stalls to increase our available boarding stalls to a total of 75.

What type of feed do you use?

We only feed premium hay, 1st and 2nd cutting. Our feed hay is stored and never wet. We feed Tribute Seniority, Kalm N EZ, and / or Kalm Ultra grain.

How often do you feed?

Feeding is done twice a day and we will also feed supplements that are provided by our owners. We also make hay available on demand during the winter months for extra energy and vitality.

Do you have automatic water?

Yes, we have automatic water system in the stalls.

How often will my horse be turned out?

Depending on the weather we turn out daily from dawn til dusk. We offer customized night turn out during warm weather as well.

What does Boarding cost per month?

Full care boarding is $650/month.
